name: Airborne Jump Wings Pointer {Band of Brothers}
description:
replaces the normal colored arrow, pointing to the corresponding pages you click on; dashboard, tumblelog, messages, help etc, to Airborne Jump Wings, made to be used with an upcoming Band of Brothers dashboard theme
(tested on chrome and firefox, but if there's any problems, you can message me here)

base code credit to: http://userstyles.org/styles/49928/tumblr-extras-heart-selector
generation kill recon Marines pointer: http://userstyles.org/styles/56720/reconnaissance-marines-pointer-generation-kill
the pacific Marines (globe&anchor) pointer: http://userstyles.org/styles/56723/marines-globe-anchor-pointer-the-pacific
